title: Free-body diagrams - textbook against a wall

content.question: An applied force is exerted on a textbook, pushing it against a rough wall, as indicated by the arrow in the figure. The applied force keeps the textbook at rest. Which of the following free-body diagrams could represent the forces exerted on the textbook?

choices.label: The figure shows a free-body diagram with four arrows of varying sizes extending from a common point on a coordinate grid. The first arrow points 5 units upward. The second arrow points 5 units downward. The third arrow points 4 units to the left. The fourth arrow points 4 units to the right and 2 units upward.
